ee kalayata daruwan niwes wala thaniyama kalaya gatha karayi .iringu pasi ena kalayata wal alingen karadara nam ematata ,ra noni da hena sathara kona hu kiyamin ya yuthuya.nathnam sathek hena palu kara dama ya hakiya .'''ane ara balanna ara thirisan minissu aliyekta wedi thiyala mara dala'''''' oya seyilame ayo rupa pettiyen bala kiyana hatiya.ee danna tharama ya .hene pala kiyanne oya pinthura walin dakina wage sundara natha.pita lali damu massak uda masa 3 1/2-4 k hidima kala yuthuya.
